locales.error_config: {#server}» {#error}Could not read/parse Music server config file!
locales.no_admin: {#server}» {#error}You have to be in admin list to do that!
locales.reloaded: {#server}» {#music}{1}$z$s {#highlite}{2}$z$s{#music} reloaded music config and cleared jukebox!
locales.sorted: {#server}» {#music}{1}$z$s {#highlite}{2}$z$s{#music} sorted song list and cleared jukebox!
locales.shuffled: {#server}» {#music}{1}$z$s {#highlite}{2}$z$s{#music} shuffled song list and cleared jukebox!
locales.jukebox_already: {#server}» {#music}You already have a song in the jukebox! Wait till it's been played before adding another.
locales.jukebox_dupl: {#server}» {#music}This song has already been added to the jukebox, pick another one.
locales.jukebox_notfound: {#server}» {#music}Song_ID not found - Type {#highlite}/music list{#music} to see all songs.
locales.jukebox_nodrop: {#server}» {#music}You don't have a song in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/music Song_ID{#music} to add one...
locales.jukebox_empty: {#server}» {#music}No songs in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/music Song_ID{#music} to add one...
locales.no_jukebox: {#server}» {#highlite}/music #{#music} is not currently enabled on this server.
